languages.text: "Заказ у мастера-ювелира, Ваша Светлость. Одна из придворных дам передала эту безделицу с четкими указаниями для художника, который должен был инкрустировать его драгоценными камнями. Секунду..."

"It was part of a commission for a jeweller, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. One of the ladies of the court sent this trinket along with precise instructions for the artisan, who was to encrust it with precious stones. One moment..."
languages.original_text: "Заказ у мастера-ювелира, Ваша Светлость. Одна из придворных дам передала эту безделицу с четкими указаниями для художника, который должен был инкрустировать его драгоценными камнями. Секунду..."

traits.locale_text: "It was part of a commission for a jeweler, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. One of the ladies of the court sent this trinket along with precise instructions for the artisan, who was to encrust it with precious stones. One moment..."

"It was part of a commission for a jeweler, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. One of the ladies of the court sent this trinket along with precise instructions for the artisan, who was to encrust it with precious stones. One moment..."

"It was part of a commission for a jeweler, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. One of the ladies of the court sent this trinket along with precise instructions for the artisan, who was to encrust it with precious stones. One moment..."

"It was part of a commission for a jeweller, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. One of the ladies of the court sent this trinket along with precise instructions for the artisan, who was to encrust it with precious stones. One moment..."

languages.text: “这是珠宝商的委托，大人。宫廷里的某位女士送来了这件饰品，给工匠下达了精确的指示，要求他们将贵重的宝石镶嵌在上面。请稍等一下……”
languages.original_text: "It was part of a commission for a jeweller, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. One of the ladies of the court sent this trinket along with precise instructions for the artisan, who was to encrust it with precious stones. One moment..."

traits.locale_text: “这是珠宝商的委托，大人。宫廷里的某位女士送来了这件饰品，给工匠下达了精确的指示，要求他们将贵重的宝石镶嵌在上面。请稍等一下……”

languages.text: «Era parte de una comisión para un joyero, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Una de las damas de la corte envió este abalorio junto con instrucciones precisas para el artesano, que debía incrustarle piedras preciosas. Un momento...».
languages.original_text: "It was part of a commission for a jeweller, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. One of the ladies of the court sent this trinket along with precise instructions for the artisan, who was to encrust it with precious stones. One moment..."

traits.locale_text: «Era parte de una comisión para un joyero, mi{mf|lord|lady}. Una de las damas de la corte envió este abalorio junto con instrucciones precisas para el artesano, que debía incrustarle piedras preciosas. Un momento...».

languages.text: 「宝石職人への手数料の一部となります、陛下。宮廷のご婦人方の一人が、このアクセサリーに宝石をはめこんだ職人に宛てて、正確な指示書と一緒に送るものです。少々お待ちを…」
languages.original_text: "It was part of a commission for a jeweller, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. One of the ladies of the court sent this trinket along with precise instructions for the artisan, who was to encrust it with precious stones. One moment..."

traits.locale_text: 「宝石職人への手数料の一部となります、陛下。宮廷のご婦人方の一人が、このアクセサリーに宝石をはめこんだ職人に宛てて、正確な指示書と一緒に送るものです。少々お待ちを…」

languages.text: "Er war Teil eines Auftrags für einen Juwelier, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Eine der Hofdamen hatte genaue Anweisungen für das Stück und wollte es mit wertvollen Edelsteinen verziert haben. Einen Moment ..."
languages.original_text: "It was part of a commission for a jeweller, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. One of the ladies of the court sent this trinket along with precise instructions for the artisan, who was to encrust it with precious stones. One moment..."

traits.locale_text: "Er war Teil eines Auftrags für einen Juwelier, Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft}. Eine der Hofdamen hatte genaue Anweisungen für das Stück und wollte es mit wertvollen Edelsteinen verziert haben. Einen Moment ..."

languages.text: « Il fait l'objet d'une commande passée auprès d'un joaillier, Votre Seigneurie. L'une des dames de la cour l'a envoyé avec des instructions très précises à l'attention de l'artisan, quoi doit l'incruster de pierres précieuses. Un petit instant... »
languages.original_text: "It was part of a commission for a jeweller, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. One of the ladies of the court sent this trinket along with precise instructions for the artisan, who was to encrust it with precious stones. One moment..."

traits.locale_text: « Il fait l'objet d'une commande passée auprès d'un joaillier, Votre Seigneurie. L'une des dames de la cour l'a envoyé avec des instructions très précises à l'attention de l'artisan, quoi doit l'incruster de pierres précieuses. Un petit instant... »

languages.text: "Bir mücevherat siparişine dâhildi {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri. Saray hanımlarından biri, yanında bibloyu değerli taşlarla kaplayacak zanaatkâr için kesin talimatlar da yollamıştı. Bir saniye..."
languages.original_text: "It was part of a commission for a jeweller, Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship}. One of the ladies of the court sent this trinket along with precise instructions for the artisan, who was to encrust it with precious stones. One moment..."
